title: Leaver Buster Over the Top
body:
This new Leaver Buster is having an extremely negative effect on my gaming experience. I join a game and for no reason why my computer doesn't go into the game for a short period in every 10 or so games. Then a pop up 5 minutes later will say you have been disconnected please reconnect.
As this happens and i am AFK for a short period i have leaver buster every few games.
It is extremely frustrating.
Even after playing maybe 30-40 games it happens again and i have to wait another 100 minutes 5*20,. and 1/4 of the time i have to wait the 20 minutes twice

There needs to be some middle ground.

replies.body: I have actually never received LeaverBuster for crashing and disconnections. The only problem I've had with it is that sometimes life just makes you need to leave a game, and I sometimes get a low priority queue even if the last time I left was two weeks ago. Understandable, but sort of annoying. Oh well :/
I've had BAD experiences with leaverbuster for almost similiar issues. General unreliability. Seems to have been fixed after I flushed my DNS and downloaded "Lol IPHelper tool"
